attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: My sisters best friends guinea pig downloaded this app to my phone and when I opened the app, my phone glitched. It shuts down on its own and it needs to stop! This app is a piece of trash and needs to be DESTROYED. Also, my fish has a seizure every time I open the app. RIDICULOUS!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I can’t believe I even got this app. I might as well have watched paint dry, that’s how bland and disheartening it was. Well actually, at least I know that watching paint dry is productive and soon, the surface will be great. This app is the exact opposite, except the painted surface is America.

attributes.title: Terrible do not use this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the next thing I knew everything on my phone completely shut down and started being inappropriate to young women

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRILE
attributes.review: when i opened the app it showed mr cheeto man. then it gave me a message saying he was going to steal my oven and all of my ramen. that’s when all of a sudden a dinosaur came crashing into my backdoor and opened a time portal and threw me into it. i’ve been stuck in 1200 ever since </3

attributes.title: Bad App 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
attributes.review: This app will track your location and glitch your phone out. I got a new phone last weekend and when I deleted the app my phone was ok. It also killed my pet ladybug so I will be asking to see it’s manager.

attributes.title: Absolute RUBBISH
attributes.review: This app will steal your family members and 2006 Honda Civic. When I went out to feed my platypus I discovered that my mother had been deported back to China and her 2006 Honda Civic gone too 😡. Then an orange monkey came crashing into my house with a wrecking ball and threw my grandma off a bridge. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😤

attributes.title: This app is only for people who are rich, straight, white, males
attributes.review: I downloaded this, but then I remembered that it’s for white supremacists. I have since deleted it. Also the layout and design of the app made me want to throw up ❤️Very ugly, very racist—don’t recommend.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It gave my phone a virus (because it wouldn’t wear a mask! How rude!). And it spread all this fake news, like that getting tested for the coronavirus increases cases, that African Americans have nothing to lose by voting for Trump, and that Obama wasn’t born in America. 0/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: this app made my parents get divorced!!!
attributes.review: my family was so happy until my dad downloaded this app. when he downloaded it cruella de vil showed up at our door and then took my moms dog. my mom loved that dog with all of her heart except now the dog was gone all thanks to my dad. my dad felt so bad but when he tried to delete the app, some orange oompa loompa told him that he couldn’t bc downloading the app and being racist, homophobic, transphobic, etc, will help make america great again😾

attributes.title: Terrible 🤢🤮
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my phone started glitching. It sent out a shock of electricity that put me in a comma for months. Unfortunately the comma did not last long enough for me to wake up to a world without an idiotic president. One star!!!!!😡
